title: Looking to start a semi-serious-fun team that consists of players from Silver to Gold
body:
Currently, we are looking for a top laner only.

We also want to make sure that while we are looking to be semi-serious we also want people who are looking to have fun too. 

We will immediately drop anyone who is overly toxic to anyone on the team as well as anyone in game.

Leave your age, role, and champions you play down below and add me on league: Istehz.

replies.body: Well, I play all lanes but pref jg/top. Added you on Aetheiwine. Play a large variety btw.

Support main.
I like to bant though, and knowing this community, wouldn't that count as being "overly toxic"

Yes and no, there is a clear difference between banter and being overly toxic.

Banter is a joke, it's something that someone doesn't mean between people that get along mainly.

However, being overly toxic is more like using threats, wishing death upon your enemies or teammates + their families, constant negative attitude, spam pinging.

Shit talking is fine if it comes off as a joke but if it's a constant thing that actually puts a player down then it's not okay.

You get me?
